mapper.select: SELECT salesCount , productName FROM (SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_NO) salesCount , PRODUCT_KNAME productName FROM ORDER_DETAIL JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_KNAME ORDER BY salesCount DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT COUNT(PURCHASE_NO) FROM PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = TO_CHAR((SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL), 'yy/MM/dd')) totalOrder , (SELECT COUNT(PURCHASE_NO) FROM PURCHASE WHERE ORDER_STATUS = '픽업완료' AND TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = TO_CHAR((SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL), 'yy/MM/dd')) totalPickup , (SELECT SUM(PURCHASE_PRICE) FROM PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = TO_CHAR((SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL), 'yy/MM/dd')) totalPrice , (SELECT SUM(PURCHASE_PRICE) FROM PURCHASE WHERE REFUND_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(REFUND_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = TO_CHAR((SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL), 'yy/MM/dd')) totalRefund FROM PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = TO_CHAR((SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL), 'yy/MM/dd') GROUP BY PURCHASE_PRICE
SELECT TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'yyyy') year FROM PURCHASE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'yyyy') ORDER BY year DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'MM') month , SUM(PURCHASE_PRICE) totalPrice FROM PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'yyyy') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'MM') ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'MM') month , SUM(PURCHASE_PRICE) totalPrice FROM PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'yyyy') = #{ year } GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(PURCHASE_DATE, 'MM') ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT PURCHASE_DATE) FROM PURCHASE
WHERE PURCHASE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{ startDate }, 'yy/MM/dd') AND PURCHASE_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{ endDate }, 'yy/MM/dd')
